tasks.title: Fix missing useAgency hook causing ProgressiveDashboard build error
tasks.description: The ProgressiveDashboard component is failing to build because it's trying to import a useAgency hook from @/hooks/useAgency that doesn't exist. This is causing a module resolution error and preventing the dashboard from loading properly.
tasks.details: The error occurs in ./src/components/dashboard/ProgressiveDashboard.tsx:4:1 with import: import { useAgency } from '@/hooks/useAgency'; Need to either create the missing hook or remove the import and fix the component to work without it.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the dashboard loads without errors and the ProgressiveDashboard component renders correctly
